text:
As outlined in our standard contract terms, once a client's term has expired or has been terminated, then ScheduleHouse will no longer retain the client data.
ScheduleHouse will only retain client data for as long as needed.
This means, we will retain client data for as long as the client has a current and active account with ScheduleHouse.
If paying by Credit Card, the credit card number asked for is not stored by ScheduleHouse, but instead is only used by the Secure Payment Gateway.
We may collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our website ("Log Data").
